information: Welcome to Burg Group, the world's most sustainable manufacturer of natural vinegar and tasty syrups. With our specialist knowledge and wide range of products, we inspire and support our customers. We also supply high-quality concepts under private label. For over 75 years, we have been able to offer quality, flavour and convenience to retail organisations, food manufacturers and consumers. Natural vinegar vs synthetic vinegar – Vinegar can be produced in many different ways. Natural vinegar is obtained through the biological fermentation of alcoholic liquids and comes from an agricultural source. Synthetic vinegar, on the other hand, is usually obtained from fossil fuels.
